thread.section_title: Spier Wine Farm (Stellenbosch, South Africa): Top Tips Before You Go - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Food Wine and Segway travel
thread.title_full: Food Wine and Segway travel - Review of Spier Wine Farm, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Robert W
title: Food Wine and Segway travel
text:
6 of us on last day of Sth African wine tour looking for lunch and glass of wine pre airport - a very pleasant surprise indeed!
1 hour on Segway with clear and helpful instructions Up through the backlands into the vineyard seeing local farm and details on Merlot grown the organic way. Back for lunch - excellent 'grub' with home grown wine and brewed beer in the Hoghouse All this wrapped in beautiful Stellenbosh white and green- recommended
